item.title: Convert Byte to Hex and Hex to Byte in Golang
item.description: In this post of to-the-point series, we will convert a hex string to a byte array and vice-versa. For this, we're going to use the encoding/hex package provided by the golang. Package hex implements hexadecimal encoding and decoding. byte array to hex string To convert a byte array to hex string, we will encode the byte array to the hexadecimal string. Syntax func EncodeToString(src []byte) string First we will convert a string to a byte array.
